name: Onibito Kiki
storyline: The story’s protagonist, KIKI, is the current head of the ONIBITO clan. She takes on requests to face numerous crises, defeating powerful enemies along the way. Experience the thrill of overwhelming your foes with her unique combat style and special abilities!
summary: Experience ONIBITO KIKI’s first game adaptation in 90s-style 2D action! Play as KIKI, leader of the ONIBITO clan, using special abilities to conquer tough missions. Enjoy retro pixel art combined with modern gameplay—join KIKI on an epic adventure!
